title: Here's my personal list of simple nerfs that will fix broken champions for good.
body:
{{champion:103}} - Q doesn't give movement speed if it doesn't hit an enemy champion
{{champion:122}} Decimate now slows Darius for 20% while he is charging it, decaying over the duration.
{{champion:131}} Reduce her base health to 530 from 589 and remove the attack speed buff on her passive.
{{champion:60}} Reduce her E stun duration to 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds from 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds. Revert some of her couple nerfs to compensate.
{{champion:114}} Base movement speed reduced to 335 from 345. Q's mana cost is increased to 40 at all ranks from 20/25/30/35/40.
{{champion:41}} Critical strike ratio to Kegs reduced by 20% from 0% (which means kegs's crits deal 160% damage).
{{champion:222}} Rockets splash damage deal 25% reduced damage compared to initial target. Also, W AD ratio reduced to 1.0 from 1.4
{{champion:429}} Q base damage reduced to 10/35/60/85/110 from 10/70/130/190/250. E no longer refunds mana upon kill.
{{champion:64}} Base movement speed reduced to 335 from 350.
{{champion:99}} Revert her last set of buffs.
{{champion:82}} Dragon passive on his ultimate removed.
{{champion:2}} Q mana cost increased to 60/65/70/75/80 from 60 at all ranks. E cooldown changed to 10 seconds at all ranks from 12/11/10/9/8.
{{champion:92}} E cooldown increased to 20/18/16/14/12 from 10/9/8/7/6. Using Valor towards enemy champions reduces Valor's cooldown by 50%. Also, Riven loses the steroid on her ultimate if she casts Wind Slash. 
{{champion:223}} Revert ALL of his previous buffs.
{{champion:412}} Remove his E passive
{{champion:67}} Silver Bolts no longer have flat true damage.
{{champion:45}} Revert his last set of buffs.
{{champion:157}} Reduce his base health regen to 2.5 from 6.5 and reduce his base movement speed to 340. Q cooldown increased to 5/4.75/4.5/4.25/4 seconds from 4 seconds at all ranks.
{{champion:238}} He is now a pirate.

I'm waiting for your downvotes.
